Sentencas: In this work, we extend our earlier studies on the model mixed ionic electronic conducting cathode material system SrTi1-xFexO3-x/2+delta (STF) by examining how the substitution of Ba for Sr in BaxSr1-xTi1-yFeyO3-y/2+delta (BSTF) impacts the defect equilibria, band gap and ultimately specific aspects of its cathodic behavior in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Cathodic and defect properties of BaxSr1-xTi1-yFeyO3-y/2+δ mixed conducting oxides

Sentencas: Here we report initial measurements performed on the compositions BaxSr1-xTi0.35Fe0.35O2.825+delta (x = 0.1 and 0.5).
Titulo: Cathodic and defect properties of BaxSr1-xTi1-yFeyO3-y/2+δ mixed conducting oxides

Sentencas: including examination of oxygen nonstoichiometry of bulk specimens by thermogravimetric analysis and optical absorption and electrochemical impedance spectroscopy of BSTF thin films.
Titulo: Cathodic and defect properties of BaxSr1-xTi1-yFeyO3-y/2+δ mixed conducting oxides

Sentencas: The films were deposited onto single crystal yttria stabilized zirconia by pulsed laser deposition and their electrode impedance was examined as a function of temperature in air.
Titulo: Cathodic and defect properties of BaxSr1-xTi1-yFeyO3-y/2+δ mixed conducting oxides

Sentencas: Ba substitution was found to lead to an increased lattice parameter, decreased band gap energy, and enhanced reducibility.
Titulo: Cathodic and defect properties of BaxSr1-xTi1-yFeyO3-y/2+δ mixed conducting oxides

Sentencas: These observations are discussed in relation to the reduced activation energies observed for the electrode impedance with increased Ba substitution for Sr and the importance of minority electrons in influencing electrode behaviour.
Titulo: Cathodic and defect properties of BaxSr1-xTi1-yFeyO3-y/2+δ mixed conducting oxides

Sentencas: Preliminary evidence for surface degradation appears evident from an observed time dependent increase in electrode impedance.
Titulo: Cathodic and defect properties of BaxSr1-xTi1-yFeyO3-y/2+δ mixed conducting oxides
